```{r}
global_plastic_fate <- readr::read_csv("data/global-plastic-fate.csv")

global_plastic_fate%>%
rename(percentage = `Estimated historic plastic fate`) -> global_plastic_fate


global_plastic_fate%>%
group_by(Entity)%>%
ggplot(aes(x = Year, y = percentage, fill= Entity, color= Entity)) + 
 geom_point()+
 theme_minimal()
```
